========
nyxtools
========

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/JunAishima/nyxtools.svg

Common code for the NYX beamline at NSLS-II.

* Free software: 3-clause BSD license
* Documentation: (COMING SOON!) https://JunAishima.github.io/nyxtools.
